caption:
"A glossy ceramic mug with deep blue coloring and rounded shape. Has a comfortable handle and flat base. Made for holding hot drinks. Sitting beside a coffee maker and jar of beans on a kitchen counter."

"A possibly metallic faucet-type object with silver coloring and angular shape. Features a curved spout and control knobs. Likely used for dispensing water. Positioned above a sink in a kitchen setting."

"Inconclusive evidence for the category of the object, but it appears to be a metallic tool-type object with matte silver finish and angular grooves. Ambiguous function between wrench or specialized clamp. Seen in workshop environment near assembly parts."

"A white cabinet-type object with smooth surface and rectangular shape. Features a handle and closed doors. Likely used for storage. Located in a kitchen area above a stove."

"A possibly glass vase-type object with translucent amber coloring. Fluted body shape and water droplets on surface. Likely floral display container. Found on windowsill with plants and pruning shears nearby."
